Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27516 affecting package python-jinja2 for versions less than 3.1.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27516 affecting package python-jinja2 for versions less than 3.1.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-jinja2 is earlier than 3.1.2-3, affected by CVE-2025-27516
